definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
in sight but unattainable (idiom)/inaccessible/also written 可望而不可及[ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2]
pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

definition: favorite (to win a race or championship)/well-placed contestant
can be expected to be a success

pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

sentences.english: The recombinant N protein is potentially valuable antigen for serological tests and immunoprophlaxis of PRRS.
sentences.chinese: 表達蛋白可望成爲有價值的PRRS診斷抗原。

sentences.english: In the eyes of ordinary people, Beidaihe is an unattainable place.
sentences.chinese: 在老百姓眼中，北戴河是一個可望而不可即的地方。

sentences.english: If your term were favorable, you may expect a large order from us.
sentences.chinese: 如貴方條件優惠，則可望得到我們的大量訂貨。

sentences.english: Happiness is not far away like a mirage, that is not expected.
sentences.chinese: 幸福，並非遙遠得如海市蜃樓，可望不可即。

sentences.english: This is expected to drive large private and foreign follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 這可望帶動大量民資和外資的跟進。

sentences.english: Fostering excellent students can be expected soon.
sentences.chinese: 培養優秀的學生指日可望。

sentences.english: The party is expected to emerge from Tunisia's first elections with real power.
sentences.chinese: 黨可望擺脫有實權突尼斯的第一次選舉。

sentences.english: Beijing would do well to heed these tales of caution.
sentences.chinese: 北京若能將這些經驗引以爲鑑，可望安然度過。

sentences.english: We a ume we shall receive an advice within a few days.
sentences.chinese: 我們相信日內可望收到銀行通知。

sentences.english: Dose escalation ha the promise of increased local-regional tumor control and survival rate.
sentences.chinese: 提高劑量可望提高局部控制率和生存率。

sentences.english: The astronauts, who are said to be very excited, are ex pected to land on the moon shortly.
sentences.chinese: 那些宇航員們可望不久登上月球，據說他們很激動。

sentences.english: One of its applications is possible for obtaining birefringence information of biological tissues.
sentences.chinese: 獲取生物組織的雙折射信息可望是其應用之一。

sentences.english: Exp: That knock-out beauty is tantalized to all the men.
sentences.chinese: 那個美人兒對說所有男人來說都是可望不可及的。

sentences.english: In two short hours we may look for succor from Webb.
sentences.chinese: 在短短的兩小時內，韋布將軍的救兵就可望到達。

sentences.english: This deposition system can be expected to be a new erasable picture recorder.
sentences.chinese: 該沉積系統可望作爲一種新的可擦除圖像記錄器。

sentences.english: This requirement for cosmology might be satisfied by quantum cosmology.
sentences.chinese: 這個要求可望在量子宇宙論中得到滿足。

definition: market share/abbr. for 市場佔有率|市场占有率
to look far ahead/to look forward (to)
to shift resources into areas of need/to inject funds/to balance resources
